oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ernest Tubb
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ernest Tubb holding a guitar, standing in front of a WSM radio microphone
Tubb is considered the pioneer of the "honky tonk" sound in country music. He made his Grand Ole Opry debut in 1943.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Radio; Broadcasting; Music; Country Music; Country music--1941-1950; Tubb, Ernest (Musician)
